experience.name: eRevMax
details: Actively involved in the development and maintenance of Angular-based web applications,contributing to theenhancement of user interfaces and overall user experience.
Troubleshoot and debug issues to optimize performance, delivering high-quality solutions within project timelines.

Successfully developed and implemented two major features, incorporating comprehensive CRUD (Create, Read, Update,Delete) operations, pagination, and advanced search functionality. Which is live on RateTiger hotel channel manager.
Actively contributed to the development of various other features, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to meet project requirements.

experience.name: Flipkart Big Box Haringhata
details: Managed entire Operations handling products to be shipped generating barcodes and Applying the Barcodes on products after scanning used to do Order Cancelation Team Management Managed Flipkart Big Billion Day Sales Execution Part.
